<CrystalVirtualGoodsDelegate> Protocol Reference

Delegate protocol for the CrystalVirtualGoods class. More...

#import <CrystalVirtualGoods.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(void) - crystalVirtualGoodsInfoUpdatedWithSuccess:
 Reports to the client that the CrystalVirtualGoods info has been updated The updates can come as a result of changes in virtual currency balances, purchased items, etc. When updating balances and goods via the postGoods: and postBalances: APIs this method will be called to inform the client that the server-side data has been updated. This update message can still be received while the Crystal UI is still open, so it's important not to play any sounds or change the UI in response to the message.

Detailed Description

Delegate protocol for the CrystalVirtualGoods class.

Member Function Documentation

- (void) crystalVirtualGoodsInfoUpdatedWithSuccess: (BOOL)  success   [optional]

Reports to the client that the CrystalVirtualGoods info has been updated The updates can come as a result of changes in virtual currency balances, purchased items, etc. When updating balances and goods via the postGoods: and postBalances: APIs this method will be called to inform the client that the server-side data has been updated. This update message can still be received while the Crystal UI is still open, so it's important not to play any sounds or change the UI in response to the message.

Parameters:
success YES if the update was successful
